required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Community Based Approach to Reducing Rural Cancer Disparities
clinical_study.official_title: A Community Based Approach to Reducing Rural Cancer Disparities

brief_summary.textblock: The overall goal is to develop a culturally appropriate and easy to disseminate educational intervention documented to improve cancer prevention and increase cancer screening behaviors in the rural Midwest.

detailed_description.textblock:
Objective: To evaluate how a modified version of CC&S may reduce health disparities.
Specific Aim: To evaluate the impact of participation in CC&S educational sessions on cancer prevention and screening.
Study Design: To evaluate the impact of participation in CC&S educational sessions on cancer prevention and screening. The investigators will recruit 60 community members; 30 will receive CC&S training (intervention group) and 30 will not (control group). All 60 will be surveyed about their intent to change their behavior at the beginning of the study and their actual behavior changes and screening behavior 6 months after the beginning of the study.
Goal: The overall goal is to develop a culturally appropriate and easy to disseminate educational intervention documented to improve cancer prevention and increase cancer screening behaviors in the rural Midwest.

primary_outcome.description: The investigators will evaluate if the participants received preventive cancer screening 6 months after the completion of the educational program

secondary_outcome.description: Using structured survey questions, self-reported date of birth, gender, race/ethnicity, total household income measured with income categories, ranging from < $5,000/yr to > $75,000/yr, educational attainment recorded in terms of years of formal schooling completed, current job title, current insurer and zip code of residence to confirm they live in rural WI will be collected..

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1st day of educational session and 6 months post completion of intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Questions about basic cancer knowledge, knowledge of cancer prevention and self-care, screening and detection will be asked using a structured questionnaire.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1st day of educational intervention and 6 months post completion of intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Measures and indicators of health behaviors include cigarette smoking, alcohol consumption, physical activity and weight will be asked using a structured questionnaire.

secondary_outcome.measure: Intent to Change their Health Behaviors
secondary_outcome.time_frame: First and last day of the educational intervention (2 to 4 weeks after the first day of the program)
secondary_outcome.description: Participants report an intent to change their health behaviors using a structured survey during the first educational session and during the last educational session.
Participants change their health behaviors 6 months after the completion of the educational intervention will be collected using a structured survey

arm_group.description: Participants in this study group will receive the Cancer Clear and Simple education session. This is a 2.5 hour educational program. Participants will complete a 15 minute survey prior to the educational program, at the end of the educational program and six months following the completion of the educational program.

Participants in this study group will receive the Nutrition Education. This is a 2.5 hour educational program. Participants will complete a 15 minute survey prior to the educational program, at the end of the educational program and six months following the completion of the educational program.

intervention.description: This is a 2.5 hour educational program about cancer knowledge, cancer risk factors and preventative cancer screenings.
This is a 2.5 hour educational program about nutrition and making healthy choices.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 25 years of age or older
Exclusion Criteria:
